original_text: So Elijah went to show himself to Ahab. Now the famine was severe in Samaria.
korean_text: 엘리야가 아합에게 보이려고 가니 그 때에 사마리아에 기근이 심하였더라

sentences.original_text: So Elijah went to show himself to Ahab.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 엘리야는 아합에게 자신을 나타내려고 갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: Now the famine was severe in Samaria.
